AbleToStopDrugs_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, are you always able to stop using drugs when you want to? (If never use drugs, answer “Yes.” )

AbuseMoreThanOneDrugAtATime_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, do you abuse more than one drug at a time?

AlcoholHowManyDrinksDay_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, how many drinks containing alcohol did have on a typical day when you are drinking?

AlcoholHowOften6Drinks_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, how often did you have six or more drinks on one occasion?

AlcoholHowOften_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, how often did you have a drink containing alcohol?

BlackoutFlashbackDrugUse_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you had "blackouts" or "flashbacks" as a result of drug use?

CannabisConsideredReduction_pre.Description: Have you ever thought about cutting down, or stopping, your use of cannabis?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the past 6 months

CannabisHoursStoned_pre.Description: How many hours were you ‘stoned’ on a typical day when you had been using Cannabis?

CannabisHowOften_pre.Description: How often do you use cannabis?

CannabisPast6Months_pre.Description: Have you used any cannabis over the 6 months prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area ?

CigsPerDay_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, on average, how many cigarettes did you smoke a day (1 pack = 20 cigarettes)?

Levels.1: Less than a cigarette a day

EngagedInIllegalActsToObtainDrugs_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you engaged in illegal activities in order to obtain drugs?

FeelBadGuiltyDrugUse_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, do you ever feel bad or guilty about your drug use? If never use drugs, choose “No.”

HowOftenCantStopCannabis_pre.Description: How often during the six months prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area did you find that you were not able to stop using cannabis once you had started?

HowOftenCantStopDrinking_pre.Description: How often during the last year prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

HowOftenDevotedTimeCannabis_pre.Description: How often in the six months prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you devoted a great deal of your time to getting, using, or recovering from cannabis?

HowOftenDrinkMorning_pre.Description: How often during the last year prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

HowOftenFailedActivitiesCannabis_pre.Description: How often during the six months prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area did you fail to do what was normally expected from you because of using cannabis?

HowOftenFailedActivitiesDrinking_pre.Description: How often during the last year prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you failed to do what was normally expected from you because of drinking?

HowOftenGuiltRemorseDrinking_pre.Description: How often during the last year prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

HowOftenHazardousCannabis_pre.Description: How often do you use cannabis in situations that could be physically hazardous, such as driving, operating machinery, or caring for children?

HowOftenMemoryConcentrationProblemCannab.Description: How often in the six months prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you had a problem with your memory or concentration after using cannabis?

HowOftenUnableRememberDrinking_pre.Description: How often during the last year prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?

HowSoonSmokeAfterWaking_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, how soon after you wake up did you smoke your first cigarette?

InjuredDrinking_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the last year

LifetimeSmoke100Cigs.Description: Altogether, have you smoked at least 100 or more cigarettes in your entire lifetime?

MedicalProblemsDueToDrugUse_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you had medical problems as a result of your drug use (e.g., memory loss, hepatitis, convulsions, bleeding, etc.)?

NeglectedFamilyDrugUse_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you neglected your family because of your use of drugs?

OtherDrugs_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you used drugs other than those required for medical reasons?

RelativeFriendConcernedDrinking_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, has a relative or friend or a doctor or another health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

Levels.2: Yes but not in the last year

SmokeEveryDay_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, did you smoke cigarettes every day, some days or not at all?

SpouseParentsComplainDrugUse_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, does your spouse (or parents) ever complain about your involvement with drugs?

WidthdrawalSymptoms_pre.Description: Prior to the onset of the Corona/COVID-19 crisis in your area, have you ever experienced withdrawal symptoms (felt sick) when you stopped taking drugs?
